H0.text: Which British island was known to the Romans as Vectis. Isle of Man

H1.text: Which British island was known to the Romans as Vectis. Isle of Wight's neighboring island, Portland

H2.text: Which British island was known to the Romans as Vectis. The island of Anglesey

H3.text: Which British island was known to the Romans as Vectis. IoW

A4.text: The oldest records that give a name for the Isle of Wight are from the Roman Empire. It was called Vectis or Vecta in Latin
